job_tasks.phrase: Research the latest techniques and methods in deep learning and natural language processing to improve the dialog system
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to researching and applying advanced techniques in deep learning and NLP, which are core to model development.

job_tasks.phrase: improve the dialog system across different use cases, including multimodal conversation, long-term memory, chitchat, intent recognition and others
job_tasks.justification: This describes the application and enhancement of specific modeling capabilities within a dialog system, covering various advanced functionalities.

job_tasks.phrase: Work closely with stakeholders from product, engineering, content policy on a long-term improvement over the dialog system use cases
job_tasks.justification: This involves collaboration with different business units to align technical improvements with product strategy and policy.

job_tasks.phrase: Introduce new techniques, tools, and architecture that improve the quality, performance, latency, throughput, and efficiency of our models
job_tasks.justification: This phrase implies not just model development but also the integration and architecture choices that impact the overall software system's performance and efficiency.

job_tasks.phrase: Create products that are used by millions of Snapchatters
job_tasks.justification: This indicates the outcome of the work is a user-facing product, requiring software development principles for scalability and user experience.

soft_skills.phrase: Work closely with stakeholders from product, engineering, content policy
Research the latest techniques and methods
Introduce new techniques, tools, and architecture

classification.rationale: The role focuses heavily on improving a dialog system using deep learning and NLP techniques, including multimodal conversation and long-term memory, aligning with the core of GenAI. The emphasis on researching new techniques and integrating them into user-facing products used by millions also strongly supports this classification.
